help.description: To get help on all supported commands, or a specified command

week.help: Type week to see what the current week is set to. Type 'week 5' to set to week 5.
week.description: Sets or gets the current day

week.help: Type day to see what the current day is set to. Type 'day 5' to set to day 5.
week.description: Sets or gets the current week

gem.description: Fetches details of the specified Ruby gem
